channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - laptop

item.title: Switching to new laptop
item.description: I'm slowly but surely starting to switch to a new laptop. The old one hasn't completely died (yet) but given that I had to force its CPU frequency at the lowest Hz or the CPU would burn (and the system suddenly shut down due to heat issues), and that the â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
